description: People are individuals who form communities or groups based on shared interests, beliefs, or backgrounds. name: society
type: Social Structure
description: Society refers to a group of individuals who share a common culture, values, and norms. It is the framework within which people live, interact, and form communities. name: economy
type: Economic System
description: The economy is the system of production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services. name: Culture
type: Concept
description: Culture encompasses the customs, traditions, beliefs, and behaviors that characterize a society or group. It includes shared experiences, values, and practices. name: Society
type: Societal Aspect
description: Society refers to the community or group of people living in a particular country or region. name: World Cup
type: Sporting Event
description: The World Cup is an international soccer tournament that brings together millions of people from around the globe, transcending language barriers and political divisions. name: Major Sporting Events
type: Category of Events
description: A category that includes significant sporting events like the World Cup and the Olympics. name: People from Around the Globe
type: Demographic Group
description: People from different countries and cultures. name: Bridges
type: Social Connection
description: Bridges are connections or pathways that link different groups or communities. name: social change
type: Concept
description: Social change refers to the transformation of cultural values, norms, and social institutions over time. It can be driven by various factors including economic, political, and cultural influences. name: Culture and Society
type: Societal Aspect
description: Sports have a profound impact on shaping cultures around the world, influencing social norms, values, and behaviors. name: Host Cities and Countries
type: Geographical Location
description: Host cities and countries are locations that host major sporting events like the World Cup. name: global economy
type: Economic System
description: The global economy encompasses all economic activities and interactions across the world, including trade, finance, and production.
